examples.example: 麻烦您帮我递一下那本书，谢谢。

translate.english: Could you please pass me that book? Thank you.

examples.example: 麻烦您帮我指一下去车站的路好吗，非常感谢！

translate.english: Could you please show me the way to the station? Thank you very much!

examples.example: 麻烦您帮我开一下门，真是太感谢了！

translate.english: Please help me open the door. Thank you very much indeed!
